title: Low Poly Stylized Spooky Halloween Graves and Pumpkin Props
description: Create eerie scenes with our Low Poly Spooky Graveyard pack. Featuring haunted trees, graves, pumpkins, and more, set the perfect eerie atmosphere for your Unreal Engine project. Unleash your creativity this Halloween!
longDescription:
Dive into the shadows and conjure a realm of spine-tingling enchantment with our meticulously curated Low Poly Stylized Spooky Graveyard pack, exclusively tailored for Unreal Engine. As the moon casts an ethereal glow, unleash your imagination and weave tales of mystery, suspense, and otherworldly wonder within this hauntingly beautiful landscape.

This comprehensive package beckons you to construct your own macabre masterpiece, resplendent with an array of captivating elements that capture the essence of the eerie and the unknown. Venture into the heart of the graveyard, where trees stand as gnarled sentinels, their branches reaching out like skeletal fingers, and the very air seems to hum with the secrets of the departed.

Amongst the tombstones and monuments, you'll find graves that house untold stories, each one a whispered echo of lives long past. Grave markers punctuate the landscape like ghostly signposts, leading to narratives yet to be uncovered. Adorned with symbols and engravings, they add a layer of mystique to your graveyard tableau.

As Halloween approaches, pumpkins and jack-o'-lanterns come to life in this spectral setting. These grinning gourds cast a flickering light that dances across the tombstones, casting eerie shadows that heighten the sense of otherworldly intrigue. And perched upon a weathered grave, a witch's hat beckons, hinting at the arcane and the supernatural.

Venture deeper into the undergrowth, and you'll encounter mushrooms that seem to glow with an otherworldly luminescence, their forms echoing the mysteries of the night. An ornate fence encircles the perimeter, both a barrier and a portal to the realm of the unknown, inviting brave souls to venture within.

Whether you're crafting a haunted Halloween adventure, a chilling tale of the supernatural, or an exploration of the thin veil between the living and the beyond, the Spooky Graveyard pack is your conduit to immersive storytelling. Marrying the art of stylization with the power of Unreal Engine, this pack allows you to weave a tapestry of dread and fascination that will captivate your audience and leave them yearning for more. Step into the darkness and let your creativity flourish amidst the eerie beauty of the Low Poly Stylized Spooky Graveyard.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 50 Unique Static Meshes
  • 23 Materials
  • 15 Jack-O-Lanterns
  • 6 Pumpkins
  • 3 Mushrooms
  • 4 Candles
  • 4 Graves
  • 4 Grave Crosses
  • 1 Grave Maker
  • 1 Entrance Arch
  • 1 Fence
  • 2 Fence Posts
  • 1 Dirt Mound
  • 1 Haunted Tree
  • 2 Spooky Trees
  • 4 Ground Pavers
  • 1 Wall
  • 1 Witch's Hat

Number of Unique Meshes: 50

Collision: Yes, automatic

Vertex Count: 10,858

LODs: No

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 23

Number of Textures: 0

Texture Resolutions: N/A

Supported Development Platforms: Tested on a Windows-64 system. As basic models this asset pack should work on all supported UE4 platforms.

Documentation: Simple static meshes that can be dragged and dropped into your scene.
